paragraph.paragraph: EiffelEnvision comes in two distinct editions. There is the Free Edition and the Enterprise Edition. The Free Edition, as its name suggests, is the free-use edition of EiffelEnvision and is hence a lighter version of the Enterprise Edition (see compare_editions editions.xml Comparison Table ).
paragraph.note:
Note: Please be aware while you enjoy the free edition that its use is permitted for educational, non-commercial development or for an evaluation in considering the Enterprise Edition. Please see the ../licenses/index.xml Licenses
section of this documentation for more information on terms of use.
paragraph.paragraph: For information regarding EiffelEnvision Enterprise Edition and premium support and maintenance, please see our web site: http://www.eiffel.com/products/ www.eiffel.com .

The following table highlights the major feature differences between the Free Edition and Enterprise Edition.
